definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate

sentences.english: It had not been a bilateral decision with his wife to steal those documents.
sentences.chinese: 他从会计室窃取有价证券的所有证据。

sentences.english: Trading securities and available-for-sale assets grew by 16%.
sentences.chinese: 有价证券和可售资产增长16%。

sentences.english: Mr. Jeppson has a portfolio of nothing but blue chip stocks.
sentences.chinese: 杰普逊先生持有的有价证券里全部都是热门股票。

sentences.english: Returns the accrued interest for a security that pays interest at maturity.
sentences.chinese: 返回到期一次性付息有价证券的应计利息。

sentences.english: First, he assumes that by selling securities, China returns dollars to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 第一，他断言中国抛出有价证券会向美国退返美元。

definition: security (property held against a loan)/mortgaged property

pinyin: jin1 rong2 yan3 sheng1 chan3 pin3

definition: debt security/collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
cargo receipt/landing account/warehouse or storage receipt/CL:張|张[zhang1]
